data.lyric:
[ti:Life's A Mess II (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/Clever/Post Malone]
[al:Life's A Mess II (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Life's A Mess II (Explicit) - Juice WRLD/Clever/Post Malone
[00:01.02]Lyrics by：Rex Kudo/Louis Bell/Jarad Higgins/Joshua Huie/Austin Post/Ashley Frangipane/Ryan Vojesak
[00:02.05]Composed by：Rex Kudo/Louis Bell/Jarad Higgins/Joshua Huie/Austin Post/Ashley Frangipane/Ryan Vojesak
[00:03.08]Juice WRLD：
[00:03.15]Have you ever fallen head over heels for somebody
[00:08.69]Not just somebody
[00:11.35]No no
[00:12.67]Rex you did it again
[00:13.64]Have you ever fallen head over heels for somebody
[00:16.88]That made promises to give you the world
[00:19.45]Um
[00:19.74]I really hope they held you down
[00:21.67]I really hope it was no lying
[00:23.97]'Cause my heart breaks it feels like the world's gone
[00:27.23]But if the love's real you'd feel your soul roar like a lion
[00:30.63]And you'd finally let bygones be bygones
[00:33.56]Don't throw in the towel
[00:34.78]I know it feels like you're the only one tryin'
[00:37.43]You just gotta learn to live and love on
[00:41.40]I belong with the one put on this Earth for me
[00:44.85]Everybody has their someone just gotta look and see
[00:48.17]I'm screaming out "Lord help me I've been lonely"
[00:51.13]That's when you accept me then you set me free
[00:55.50]Uh sometimes life's a mess
[00:59.17]Uh I get high when I'm upset
[01:02.44]I remember when me and love didn't click
[01:05.85]Searchin' for somethin' real then I found it
[01:09.25]Uh sometimes life's a mess
[01:12.75]Yeah I get high when I'm upset
[01:16.27]I remember when me and love ain't click
[01:19.52]Lookin' for somethin' real then I found it
[01:22.01]Clever：
[01:22.18]Have you ever fallen head over heels for somebody
[01:25.49]That made promises to give you the world
[01:27.88]There's one that won't never leave you cold
[01:30.69]Or place nothing above you
[01:32.41]That will love a heart that hurts
[01:34.08]Don't hurt the heart that loves you
[01:35.99]Sometimes they just want what they can't have forbidden fruit
[01:39.68]But the one that deserves ya love will never pick and choose
[01:43.12]There was once a hole in my heart that hole was hurting
[01:46.12]'Til I took a peak inside lately I've been soul searching
[01:49.98]When I use to cry I turned to medication
[01:52.88]Then I found me something real and forgot all the imitations
[01:56.62]Just tell me that you'll never leave
[01:58.95]And when there's nothing left to say
[02:01.18]Tell me that you'll love me anyway ah
[02:03.91]Juice WRLD：
[02:04.24]Uh sometimes life's a mess
[02:07.58]Uh I get high when I'm upset
[02:11.05]I remember when me and love didn't click
[02:14.43]Searchin' for somethin' real then I found it
[02:17.85]Uh sometimes life's a mess
[02:21.33]Yeah I get high when I'm upset
[02:24.83]I remember when me and love ain't click
[02:27.91]Lookin' for somethin' real then I found it
[02:30.84]Post Malone：
[02:31.11]Have you ever fallen head over heels for somebody
[02:34.09]That made promises to give you the world
[02:36.41]And I swear I would never leave you cold
[02:39.24]There ain't no one above you
[02:40.96]You were way too high to touch
[02:42.56]I was high enough to pass out
[02:44.61]When you was so alone I was a stone's throw away
[02:47.82]I remember those lips I remember how they taste
[02:51.15]I been staring at the wall doing nothing all day
[02:54.74]I remember everything put the bottle to my face Dom Pe
[03:01.55]If you gave up on me now I would seriously be so f**ked up
[03:08.17]I'm doing everything I can just to keep myself from throwing up
[03:13.06]Never gave a f**k what they say 'bout us
[03:16.51]F**k all of you muh-f**kers slow me up
[03:19.75]And f**k everything that ruined us
[03:23.23]I'm three seconds away from pulling out my gun
data.trans:
[ti:Life's A Mess II (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/Clever/Post Malone]
[al:Life's A Mess II (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.02]//
[00:02.05]//
[00:03.08]//
[00:03.15]你可曾为谁神魂颠倒过
[00:08.69]不是随便某个人
[00:11.35]//
[00:12.67]Rex Kudo制作
[00:13.64]你可曾为谁神魂颠倒过
[00:16.88]那个人许诺给你全世界
[00:19.45]//
[00:19.74]我真的希望他们守护你到底
[00:21.67]我真的希望那些不是谎言
[00:23.97]因为我的心很痛 感觉就像世界毁灭了
[00:27.23]但如果这份爱是真的 你会感到你的灵魂像狮子一样咆哮
[00:30.63]你终究会让过去的事情都成为过去
[00:33.56]不要投降认输
[00:34.78]我知道那感觉好像只有你一个人在努力
[00:37.43]你得学会生活 一直好好活下去
[00:41.40]我属于这个世界上为我而生的人
[00:44.85]每个人都有这样一个人 只是得用心去寻找
[00:48.17]我大声呼喊 上帝 帮帮我 我好孤单
[00:51.13]就在那时候 你接受了我 然后解放了我
[00:55.50]有时候 人生就是一团乱
[00:59.17]在我焦虑的时候 我会很兴奋
[01:02.44]我记得曾经我和爱情无缘相会
[01:05.85]寻找一份真感情 后来终于找到了
[01:09.25]有时候 人生就是一团乱
[01:12.75]在我焦虑的时候 我会很兴奋
[01:16.27]我记得曾经我和爱情无缘相会
[01:19.52]寻找一份真感情 后来终于找到了
[01:22.01]//
[01:22.18]你可曾为谁神魂颠倒过
[01:25.49]那个人承诺给你全世界
[01:27.88]有个人永远不会让你难过
[01:30.69]始终把你放在第一位
[01:32.41]会爱你那一颗受伤的心
[01:34.08]不要伤害那颗爱你的心
[01:35.99]有时候他们只想得到他们不能得到的 禁果
[01:39.68]但那个值得拥有你的爱的人 永远不会挑三拣四
[01:43.12]曾今我的心上有一个洞 那个洞让我很痛苦
[01:46.12]后来我窥探自己的内心 最近我一直在搜寻自己的灵魂
[01:49.98]以前伤心的时候 我会诉诸药物
[01:52.88]后来我找到了一份真感情 忘记了所有的假象
[01:56.62]告诉我 你永远不会离开
[01:58.95]当你无话可说时
[02:01.18]告诉我 你无论如何都会爱我
[02:03.91]//
[02:04.24]有时候 人生就是一团乱
[02:07.58]在我焦虑的时候 我会很兴奋
[02:11.05]我记得曾经我和爱情无缘相会
[02:14.43]寻找一份真感情 后来终于找到了
[02:17.85]有时候 人生就是一团乱
[02:21.33]在我焦虑的时候 我会很兴奋
[02:24.83]我记得曾经我和爱情无缘相会
[02:27.91]寻找一份真感情 后来终于找到了
[02:30.84]//
[02:31.11]你可曾为谁神魂颠倒过
[02:34.09]那个人承诺给你全世界
[02:36.41]我发誓我绝不会让你难过
[02:39.24]始终把你放在第一位
[02:40.96]曾经你高高在上 不可企及
[02:42.56]曾经我嗨得快要晕厥
[02:44.61]当你无比孤单时 我和你近在咫尺
[02:47.82]我记得那双唇 我记得它的滋味
[02:51.15]我凝望着墙壁 整天无所事事
[02:54.74]我记得一切 抱着酒瓶疯狂喝 唐·培里侬
[03:01.55]如果你放弃了我 我真的会痛不欲生
[03:08.17]我拼尽全力不让自己吐出来
[03:13.06]从不在乎他们对我们的看法
[03:16.51]你们这些阻碍我的混蛋 去你们的吧
[03:19.75]把我们毁掉的一切 去你们的吧
[03:23.23]再等三秒 我就要拔出我的枪了
